mapper.insert: insert into GQPTZ_GQPJBXXB (GQPBH, GQPMC, SCSJ, WZ, JDZB, WDZB, BPLX, JZLC, PC, PJPG, ZDPG, PJPJ, ZDPJ, ZX, QX, ZYCF, PMMJ, PJGC, PDGC, DZLD, RLGCHD, YTJGLX, LXTCW, PX) values (#{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wdzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bplx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jzlc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pjpg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdpg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pjpj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdpj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zycf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmmj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pjgc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdgc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dzld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rlgchd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ytjglx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lxtcw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{px,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update GQPTZ_GQPJBXXB set SCSJ = #{scsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WZ = #{wz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JDZB = #{jdzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WDZB = #{wdzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BPLX = #{bplx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JZLC = #{jzlc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PC = #{pc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PJPG = #{pjpg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDPG = #{zdpg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PJPJ = #{pjpj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDPJ = #{zdpj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZX = #{zx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QX = #{qx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZYCF = #{zycf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PMMJ = #{pmmj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PJGC = #{pjgc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDGC = #{pdgc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DZLD = #{dzld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RLGCHD = #{rlgchd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YTJGLX = #{ytjglx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LXTCW = #{lxtcw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PX = #{px,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GQPBH = #{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and GQPMC = #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select GQPBH, GQPMC, SCSJ, WZ, JDZB, WDZB, BPLX, JZLC, PC, PJPG, ZDPG, PJPJ, ZDPJ, ZX, QX, ZYCF, PMMJ, PJGC, PDGC, DZLD, RLGCHD, YTJGLX, LXTCW, PX from GQPTZ_GQPJBXXB
